title: Sophie Ellis-Bextor's New Year's Eve Disco
overview: BBC One invites you to ring in the new year with Sophie Ellis-Bextor in a night bursting with disco glamour and infectious energy. With her band by her side, Sophie delivers an electrifying lineup of dance floor anthems spanning decades, dazzling performances, and surprise guests that keep the party alive until the wee small hours. Grab your sparkliest outfit and dancing shoes for an unforgettable celebration of music, joy, and the magic of the moment!
